install.packages("dslabs")

library(dslabs)

```{r}



data(mtcars)

class(mtcars)

## Veri Seti İnceleme

head(mtcars)

str(mtcars)

print(mtcars)

my_summary_stats <- function(vec) {

total_list <- list( ortalama = mean(vec),

medyan = median(vec),

ss = sd(vec),

minimum = min(vec),

maksimum = max(vec) )} #değerleri yazdırma

sonuc <- my_summary_stats(mtcars$mpg) 
print(sonuc)

```
